title: Seiken no Blacksmith (The Sacred Blacksmith)
synopsis: Forty-four years ago, the surviving nations of the Valbanil War declared peace and forbade the use of the devastating demon contracts that ravaged the land. Now, inexperienced knight Cecily Cambell is eager to follow the example of her family and protect the people of the city using the sword she inherited from her father.
voices: ['Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Fujimura, Ayumi', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Toyoguchi, Megumi', 'Shintani, Ryouko', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou', 'Chihara, Minori', 'Yukino, Satsuki', 'Takahashi, Mikako', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki']
staff: [['Kouchiyama, Takashi', ['Producer']], ['Hidaka, Masamitsu', ['Director']], ['Yano, Satoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Deai, Kotomi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
